comment: I thought Dr. Bremner was terrific. She really wants you to get a good grade. Show interest, do the work, and you will get an A

OK. DR.BREMNER is AWESOME. Very intelligent. All you have to do is show that you are genuinely concerned with something she will help.She is talking about. And as for her tests they might be challenging, but they will help u in the end. She even wrote a book on how to pass the NCLEX~!
She really needs to learn how to talk to people.
Uses great pneumonics. Very short with answers and not helpful. Stinky attitude and ego. Don't even blow your nose during a test...otherwise you are cheating.

Going into the class I was intimidated by her reviews and ratings.  After taking it, I think Dr. Bremner is a great lecturer and prof.  Sure the nursing exams are hard, you have to learn how to think like a nurse!  She helps you do that.  Don't be afraid of Bremner, she really is a great instructor. Lee's (assist) lectures, however I would skip.

OK Dr bremner is very experianced teacher. she knows what she is taking about. when she talk about some of her experiances don't underestimate them or don't say why she is talking about her story, trust me she know what she is doing.  those story will help you for the exam. And record her lecture and listen to it.

It's true what others have stated.  Pompous, insecure, and not very helpful at all.  I made a high B and felt several questions were not correct on the tests.  If you found the correct answers in the book, she would come back with a different excuse as to why she would not change the answer.  Unfortunately, there are no options for other teachers.
Great lecturer. Animated. Had a negative experience with her on administrative issues. Very strange reaction...

Complicated mixture of insecurity and egotism.  DO NOT ask questions--she gets angry, responds by repeating her original statement, does not really answer.  If you challenge logic of a test question it's even worse.  Loves to tell stories about herself.....
